pageContext.title: Ultimate Debut Bundle - Slider, Sticky Nav & Image on Hover
pageContext.miniDescription: Ultimate bundle for the Debut theme. Includes product page Slider, sticky header & second image on hover.
pageContext.description:
Make your Debut feel premium with our ultimate, super simple, copy-paste Debut bundle, coded by a certified Shopify partner. No coding knowledge required to install it.


One image is worth a thousand words, but one live preview's worthiness is beyond evaluation! So check this bundle working live clicking here. 


You can view the "second image on hover" in action by hovering the images of the "you may also like" section, at the bottom of the page.


→ Live Demo ←


What you'll get:


You'll receive the three products listed below:


✔️ Debut Slider Pro (click here for complete information)

✔️ Debut Sticky Navbar (click here for complete information)

✔️ Debut Show Second Image on Hover (click here for complete information)


Support:


We give 100% support to all of its users to ensure that what you're seeing on the demo page is exactly what you see on your website, same day responses are guaranteed.


If you have any questions, troubles or find bugs just reach out to me:


ezfycode@gmail.com


Important Notes:


✓ This code works exclusively on the Debut theme.


Unsure whether it would work on your theme? Send us an email and we'll be more than happy to help you figure it out.


ezfycode@gmail.com


FAQ:


Q: My product page is already customized. Can I integrate this slider into it since I can't delete everything in the product-template?

A: Absolutely. We offer custom integration for $30 USD.


Q: What is included in the support?

A: We ensure that whatever you see in the demo page is what appears on your own website. In addition, any bugs you find will be promptly investigated and fixed.


Q: Do you offer refunds?

A: Taking into consideration that it's a digital product with a live demo we do not offer refunds.


If you have any unanswered questions please feel free to reach out to us before making your purchase, we'll be happy to help.


Thank you!
